alert.note: Alert for Midland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Midland County through 1230 AM EDT... At 1145 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Clare to near Coleman to near Oil City to near Shepherd. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Coleman around 1150 PM EDT. Edenville around 1210 AM EDT. Sanford around 1220 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Averill, Gordonville, Bombay, Hope and North Bradley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
